ingredients.ingredient: 14 oz ; extra firm tofu, 1 block, drained ; (395 g)

steps.step: Use your hands to crumble the tofu into a medium bowl. Add the soy sauce, tomato sauce, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, pepper, and cayenne and stir until well-combined.
Add a drizzle of olive oil to a large baking sheet. Transfer the tofu to the baking sheet, using a spatula to spread it out as much as possible.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through, until golden brown and slightly crispy.
Fill the tortillas with the tofu, lettuce, tomato, shredded cheese, and guacamole.

Add the soy sauce, tomato sauce, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, pepper, and cayenne and stir until well-combined.
Add a drizzle of olive oil to a large baking sheet.
Transfer the tofu to the baking sheet, using a spatula to spread it out as much as possible.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through, until golden brown and slightly crispy.
Fill the tortillas with the tofu, lettuce, tomato, shredded cheese, and guacamole.
